mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO jwf_forminstance (
ProcessID, FormID, SchemaID, Subject, InitiatorID, InitiatorName, InitiatorUnitID, InitiatorUnitName, InitiatedDate, CompletedDate, DeletedDate, LastModifiedDate, LastModifierID, EntCode, EntName, DocNo, DocLevel, DocClassID, DocClassName, DocSummary, IsPublic, SaveTerm, AttachFileInfo, AppliedDate, AppliedTerm, ReceiveNo, ReceiveNames, ReceiptList, BodyType, BodyContext, BodyContextOrg, DocLinks, EDMSDocLinks, RuleItemInfo ) VALUES (
#{ProcessID}, #{FormID}, #{SchemaID}, #{Subject}, #{InitiatorID}, #{InitiatorName}, #{InitiatorUnitID}, #{InitiatorUnitName}, SYSDATE, null, null, null, null, #{EntCode}, #{EntName}, #{DocNo}, #{DocLevel}, #{DocClassID}, #{DocClassName}, #{DocSummary}, #{IsPublic}, #{SaveTerm}, #{AttachFileInfo}, TO_DATE(#{AppliedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{AppliedTerm}, #{ReceiveNo}, #{ReceiveNames}, #{ReceiptList}, #{BodyType}, #{BodyContext}, #{BodyContextOrg}, #{DocLinks}, #{EDMSDocLinks}, #{RuleItemInfo} )
SELECT JWF_FORMINSTANCE_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM dual
mapper.update: UPDATE jwf_forminstance SET LastModifiedDate = SYSDATE, LastModifierID = #{LastModifierID}, DocNo = #{DocNo}, DocLevel = #{DocLevel}, DocClassID = #{DocClassID}, DocClassName = #{DocClassName}, DocSummary = #{DocSummary}, IsPublic = #{IsPublic}, SaveTerm = #{SaveTerm}, AttachFileInfo = #{AttachFileInfo}, ReceiveNo = #{ReceiveNo}, ReceiveNames = #{ReceiveNames}, ReceiptList = #{ReceiptList}, BodyContext = #{BodyContext}, DocLinks = #{DocLinks}, EDMSDocLinks = #{EDMSDocLinks}, Subject = #{Subject}, RuleItemInfo = #{RuleItemInfo} WHERE FormInstID = #{FormInstID}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO jwf_forminstance (
ProcessID, FormID, SchemaID, Subject, InitiatorID, InitiatorName, InitiatorUnitID, InitiatorUnitName, InitiatedDate, CompletedDate, DeletedDate, LastModifiedDate, LastModifierID, EntCode, EntName, DocNo, DocLevel, DocClassID, DocClassName, DocSummary, IsPublic, SaveTerm, AttachFileInfo, AppliedDate, AppliedTerm, ReceiveNo, ReceiveNames, ReceiptList, BodyType, BodyContext, BodyContextOrg, DocLinks, EDMSDocLinks, RuleItemInfo ) SELECT
null AS ProcessID, FormID, SchemaID, Subject, InitiatorID, InitiatorName, InitiatorUnitID, InitiatorUnitName, null AS InitiatedDate, null AS CompletedDate, null AS DeletedDate, null AS LastModifiedDate, null AS LastModifierID, EntCode, EntName, '' AS DocNo, DocLevel, DocClassID, DocClassName, DocSummary, IsPublic, SaveTerm, AttachFileInfo, AppliedDate, AppliedTerm, ReceiveNo, ReceiveNames, ReceiptList, BodyType, BodyContext, BodyContextOrg, DocLinks, EDMSDocLinks, RuleItemInfo FROM jwf_forminstance WHERE FormInstID = #{FormInstID}
SELECT JWF_FORMINSTANCE_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jwf_forminstance WHERE FormInstID = #{FormInstID} AND ProcessID is null
